overview: Dear Queer Dancer follows two LGBTQ trailblazing couples­—Angelica and Jahaira and Luis and Ngoc—on their way to compete at the World Latin Dance Cup. Defying the genre’s legacy of machismo, their message to the Latin dance world is “make room. We’re here.
tagline: This isn't just their story, or just mine, this is our story.
title: Dear Queer Dancer
